title: Present simple
head: Learn the basics of the present simple and practice using it
description: The present simple tense is used to give instructions, or to express habits, reported truths, etc.
basicExample: I live in Ho Chi Minh City. She works in the office.
negativeExample: I don't live in Ho Chi Minh City. / He doesn't work in America.
interrogativeExample: Do you study English? / Does he play soccer?

title: Past simple
head: Learn the basics of the past simple and practice using it
description: The past simple tense is used to talk about events, action that occured and was completed at a particular time in the past.
basicExample: I went to Hanoi. / She live in Australia.
negativeExample: I didn't watch the World Cup yesterday. / He didn't finish his assignment.
interrogativeExample: Did you play video games last night?

exercises.sentence: When I ________ young, I _________ playing computer games.
Many years ago, people _________ to work on foot.
You ________ your homework yesterday, so you must be punished.

title: Present continuous
head: Learn the basics of the present continuous and practice using it
description: The present continous tense is used to about regular actions or activities that are happening at the moment of speaking. It can also be used for future plans.
basicExample: I am studying at New York University. / She is going out for dinner with her friends. / They are watching a movie.
negativeExample: I am not working at the moment. / She is not living with us anymore. / We are not moving to America.
interrogativeExample: Are you coming back to Ho Chi Minh City? / Is he playing video games?

exercises.sentence: He _________ to the cinema on Sunday.

title: Present Perfect
head: Learn the basics of the present perfect and practice using it
description: The present perfect is used to something that started in the past and continues in the present.
basicExample: I have lived in Ho Chi Minh City for 8 years.
negativeExample: I haven't seen a concert before. / She is not living with us anymore. / We are not moving to America. / She hasn't seen her old friends since high school.
interrogativeExample: Have you finished your assignment yet?

exercises.sentence: I _________ to New York since I was 16.
Nam _________ his friend's house since high school.
